body:
We have some students got the following errors using the GH file attached: 1. the windows generated by glazing ratio is strange. there is window split into two triangles where it supposed to be a single rectangle. There is additional triangular window for non-rectangle wall surface [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/dm99ly9wi67nlLkHPVqKOiMB2Y7YIbIcWxx5kf4wncxC*7eT2mn7C6KCQEubx1qQNFHMoSeGsa3XiZXTtD7FcRBhKg-rwakh/04.JPG) 2. the error of EP simulation indicate that: **** Severe  ** WindowMaterial:Blind="DEFAULTBLINDSMATERIAL_ZONE_A_SRF_1_GLZ_0", Illegal value combination.
**   ~~~   ** Blind to Glass Distance is less than half of the Slat Width** However, in the GH file, the distance of blind to window is set as half of the blind depth. Does this mean that the **Window Shade Generator** component doesn't work with triangular window surface? [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/dm99ly9wi66Rb9c8X30OHeL5SFop14vMMDGqPeE6GtaZ75-ZPtaoxTkWCDlObWfGeZvpz1vkU7i*eHwzf05t2*rmwqZQk23u/01.JPG) Hope to have your advice! Thanks!
topic: add glazing by ratio issue and shade generator error
